If not, see 23 // <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 24 29 #ifndef _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERTIONS_H 30 #define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERTIONS_H 1 31 32 #include <bits/c++config.h> 33 34 #ifndef _GLIBCXX_DEBUG 35 36 # define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(_Condition) 37 # define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_PEDASSERT(_Condition) 38 # define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ONLY(_Statement) 39 40 #endif 41 42 #ifndef _GLIBCXX_ASSERTIONS 43 # define __glibcxx_requires_non_empty_range(_First,_Last) 44 # define __glibcxx_requires_nonempty() 45 # define __glibcxx_requires_subscript(_N) 46 #else 47 48 // Verify that [_First, _Last) forms a non-empty iterator range. 49 # define __glibcxx_requires_non_empty_range(_First,_Last) \ 50 __glibcxx_assert(_First != _Last) 51 # define __glibcxx_requires_subscript(_N) \ 52 __glibcxx_assert(_N < this->size()) 53 // Verify that the container is nonempty 54 # define __glibcxx_requires_nonempty() \ 55 __glibcxx_assert(!this->empty()) 56 #endif 57 58 #ifdef _GLIBCXX_DEBUG 59 # define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(_Condition) __glibcxx_assert(_Condition) 60 61 # ifdef _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_PEDANTIC 62 # define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_PEDASSERT(_Condition) _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(_Condition) 63 # else 64 # define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_PEDASSERT(_Condition) 65 # endif 66 67 # define _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ONLY(_Statement) _Statement 68 #endif 69 70 #endif // _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERTIONS
